mapper.delete: DELETE from api_execution_queue where id not IN (SELECT t1.queue_id from api_execution_queue_detail t1);
mapper.select: SELECT id, report_id FROM api_execution_queue WHERE report_id != NULL AND run_mode IN ( 'API_PLAN', 'JENKINS_SCENARIO_PLAN', 'SCHEDULE_SCENARIO_PLAN' ) AND id NOT IN ( SELECT t1.queue_id FROM api_execution_queue_detail t1 ) AND report_id NOT IN ( SELECT report_id FROM test_plan_execution_queue );

SELECT t1.id FROM test_plan_report t1 WHERE t1.`status` = "Running" AND t1.id NOT IN ( SELECT t.report_id FROM api_execution_queue t WHERE t.report_id IS NOT NULL ) AND t1.id NOT IN (SELECT report_id FROM test_plan_execution_queue );
